Complexity Theory Papers

  • Large Language Models and Emergence: A Complex Systems Perspective (D. Krakauer, J. Krakauer, M. Mitchell 2000)

  • Algorithmic Theories of Everything (J. Schmidhuber 2000)

  • The Architecture of Complexity (H. Simon 1962)
  • Five Rules for the Evolution of Cooperation (M. Nowak 2006)
  • Emergence of Scaling in Random Networks
  • Collective Dynamics of ‘Small World’ Networks
